warn.NO_DATA: We are sorry, but we do not have enougth data for

tips.norm_data: For objectivity consider normalized data i.e. the number of crashes per 10 000 cars sold
tips.age_mileage: Compare defects by age or mileage

defect.rating: Rating: how serious is the defect?

about.text:
If you have ever chosen a car for yourself, you have probably watched a lot of car reviews, where bloggers of different competence told you about the pros and cons of every car and recommended what to buy. The problem is that all of these reviews are subjective, and if you are a rational mature person, and reliability of a car in the long term is important for you, you may be interested in analysis of call statistics service.

There are awesome sites such as carcomplaints.com, carproblemzoo.com, nhtsa.gov, where people describe problems encountered during the period of their car exploitation. But unfortunately there are no charts on these sites, so you can't visually compare different models and figure out which is more problematic.

that's why I’ve created my own website car-defects.com, collecting all the information from these useful resources and presenting it as graphs. Here you can compare car models, model generations and versions, visualize by age or mileage, and, for objectivity, consider normalized data i.e. the number of crashes per 10,000 cars sold. The site has information about 4 million crashes, and you can also contribute to the project by sharing your own experience.

It's a non-commercial project, created on a voluntary basis, and it is still on alpha release.

japanese-top-selling-compact-suvs.title: Japanese top-selling compact SUVs
japanese-top-selling-compact-suvs.text:
Were you aware, that in Japanese top-selling compact SUVs - Toyota Rav4, Honda CR-V, and Mazda CX-5 the only Honda CR-V has CVT - continuously variable transmission?

The potential buyers might be wondering: how reliable is this kind of transmission? There are thousands of questions, answers, and polar opinions in car forums. But let’s be absolutely objective here the statistics of car service calls aren't pretty: Compared with concurrents, Honda owners have problems with CVT two times more often than others in the first three years of use.

Of course, a CVT car is more dynamic and fuel-efficient, but if car reliability is important to you, You'd be better off taking a classic automatic transmission.

most-reliable-honda-models.title: Most reliable Honda cars
most-reliable-honda-models.text:
The Honda Civic, Honda Accord, Honda CR-V, Honda Fit, and Honda HR-V are all popular models of cars produced by Honda, a renowned Japanese automotive manufacturer. Each of these models caters to different market segments and offers various features and specifications.
 The Honda HR-V has the best reliability rating of all the Honda models in this CarDefects dataset. The studies show the severity and frequency of repairs experienced by HR-V owners are much less than others. The HR-V’s average costs are even more impressive than all subcompact SUVs, estimated at $466. And HR-V’s repairs cost less than half the average $652 that all vehicle owners spend annually.
most-reliable-honda-models.cards: [{"title":"Honda Civic","text":"The Honda Civic is a compact car known for its reliability, fuel efficiency, and practicality. It comes in various body styles, including sedan, coupe, and hatchback, making it a versatile choice for a wide range of customers. The Civic is often favored for its comfortable interior, smooth ride, and advanced safety features"},{"title":"honda accord","text":"The Honda Accord is a mid-size sedan (and previously available as a coupe) that offers a comfortable and spacious cabin with a well-balanced combination of performance and fuel efficiency. It is renowned for its strong resale value, dependable reputation, and a range of available features, making it a popular choice among families and commuters"},{"title":"Honda CR-V","text":"The Honda CR-V is a compact crossover SUV, known for its practicality and versatility. It offers ample cargo space, a comfortable ride, and excellent fuel efficiency. The CR-V is a favorite among those seeking a reliable and spacious vehicle for daily commuting or family outings"},{"title":"Honda Fit","text":"The Honda Fit, also known as the Honda Jazz in some markets, is a subcompact hatchback designed to maximize interior space and versatility despite its small size. The Fit's \"Magic Seat\" allows for various configurations to accommodate different cargo and passenger needs, making it a practical choice for city driving and urban lifestyles"},{"title":"Honda HR-V","text":"The Honda HR-V is a subcompact crossover SUV that sits below the CR-V in Honda's lineup. It provides a similar blend of versatility and fuel efficiency in a more compact package. The HR-V is a suitable option for those seeking an SUV-like vehicle with better maneuverability and city-friendly dimensions"}]

reliability-of-toyota-camry-and-honda-ac.title:
タイトル:
信頼性の比較対象：トヨタ・カムリVSホンダ・アコードのエンジン性能徹底検証
reliability-of-toyota-camry-and-honda-ac.text:
タイトル:
信頼性の比較対象：トヨタ・カムリVSホンダ・アコードのエンジン性能徹底検証！

序文:
自動車愛好家の皆さん、ご存知ですか？日々の生活に欠かせない"カー"のパートナーとして、信頼性というのは何にも代えがたい価値です。特にエンジンは車の心臓部であり、そこに缺陷があれば全てが水の泡。統計データやユーザーの体験を基に、トヨタ・カムリとホンダ・アコードという二大巨頭の信頼性を比較し、実際に何が彼らを頼れる相棒にしているのかを解明します。頻繁に耳にする"走行距離数十万キロ故障知らず"の秘密を紐解きましょう。

本文:
まず、トヨタ・カムリのエンジンは世界でも高い評価を受けています。トヨタ自体が持つ品質管理の徹底や、エンジンに採用されているVDVテクノロジーやデュアルVVT-iなどの高度な技術が、寿命を大幅に延ばす要因となっています。ホンダ・アコードも例外ではありません。アースドリームテクノロジーをはじめとする革新的エンジン設計は、効率とパフォーマンスの向上に寄与しながら信頼性を高めています。

トヨタ・カムリとホンダ・アコードのエンジンは、共に類稀なる耐久性を誇ります。しかし、"リライアビリティ"を左右する要素はエンジンだけに留まりません。両車種ともに、優れたエンジンだけでなく、運行安全性を高める様々な支援システムや乗員保護構造にもこだわり、安心して長く乗り続けることが可能です。トヨタとホンダは、緻密な比較研究に基づく部品の選定や実践的な故障テストを行っており、市場に出た後の長期にわたる品質維持を実現しているのです。

さらに、これらの車種は定期的なメンテナンスがしやすい設計になっており、「比較」検討時にも維持費の低さが打ち出されます。エンジンの構造には、故障が起きにくい仕組みが組み込まれているため、致命的な「ディフェクト」に見舞われることも少ないのです。

結論:
結局のところ、トヨタ・カムリとホンダ・アコード、両者のエンジンは驚異的な"リライアビリティ"で知られています。それぞれのブランドが長年にわたって築き上げた技術と経験は、単なる統計の数字を超える信頼を生み出しています。賢い選択をし、信頼できる車を選ぶことが、長期的な満足と経済性の確保につながります。今後も、トヨタ・カムリとホンダ・アコードは、品質にこだわるドライバーの期待に応え続けることでしょう。

audi-a4-last-3-generation.title: Reliability of the Audi A4 over the last 3 generations
audi-a4-last-3-generation.cards: [{"title":"Audi A4 B7"},{"title":"Audi A4 B8"},{"title":"Audi A4 B9"}]
audi-a4-last-3-generation.text:
For the last 3 generations, Audi A4 has become more stylish. But… has it become more reliable?

Well, statistically, the answer is yes: within each generation, the amount of service calls has decreased 3-4 times!

Furthermore, the number of engine crashes in the last generation was reduced by 15 times compared with the previous B8 generation! The new A4 has achieved great results thanks to its engines, which are sourced from the Volkswagen Audi Group.

Almost the same positive results about transmission: In the B8 generation, A4 was equipped with old-school Multitronic CVT, S tronic, and Tiptronic automatics as well as manual transmissions, but the sharper, quicker S-tronic twin-clutch arrangement is now the sole self-shifting option.

how-repair-costs-change-as-subaru-models.title: How Repair Costs Change As Subaru Models Age
how-repair-costs-change-as-subaru-models.text:
Subaru has earned a reputation for reliability, but even their vehicles require repairs as the odometer accumulates miles. Tracking service costs by mileage provides insight into which models remain affordable to maintain.

The Subaru Ascent midsize SUV averages around $350 yearly in repairs during the first 50,000 miles. From 50,000 to 100,000 miles, this rises to $400 annually, and beyond 100,000 miles costs reach about $475.

The B9 Tribeca midsize SUV follows a similar pattern. In the first 50,000 miles, owners report spending roughly $300 per year on unscheduled repairs. From 50,000 to 100,000 miles this increases to $375, and after 100,000 miles jumps to $450. 

Our car service call statistics data show that Ascent had more defects than Tribeca (almost double)

On the other hand, the Baja compact pickup displays a relatively comparable trend. For the first 50,000 miles, drivers pay approximately $250 yearly for repairs. Baja has the lowest number of service calls of the pack within the first 25,000 miles (refer to the car service call statistics data provided below).

This climbs to $325 for 50,000 to 100,000 miles and hits $400 beyond 100,000 miles.

While maintenance costs rise as mileage increases in Subarus, they remain relatively affordable compared to other brands. Baja has the lowest average repair bills across its lifespan. The Ascent is most expensive to maintain long-term compared to the three. But even higher-maintenance Subarus remains cost-effective.

Proper maintenance and repair of small issues early help minimize major repair costs down the road. But Subarus' reputation for reliability and longevity shines through in the data, no matter the mileage.

who-wins-on-reliability-toyota-or-lexus.title: Crunching the Numbers: Who Wins on Reliability - Toyota or Lexus?
who-wins-on-reliability-toyota-or-lexus.text:
We all want our rides to be reliable and affordable to maintain. 

Among the brands with  an unbeatable reputation for reliability are Toyota and Lexus. But just how reliable are these Japanese brands compared to each other? 

Let's crunch the numbers.

Analysis of car service call statistics reveals that Lexus edges out Toyota slightly when it comes to long-term reliability per mile driven. The average Toyota have over 27,000 defects reported by 25,000 miles. Lexus models have far less at around 2000 reported defects within the same mileage. 

From the brand model generation search bar:

Choose Toyota and then click “Search for defects by Toyota” on the far right. A graph will come up with the generated data, pulled from useful resources such as nhtsa.gov. 

 Next, click on the brand model generation search bar and choose Lexus (for the comparison), and then click  “Search for defects by Lexus.” This includes a Lexus bar chart, beside the Toyota in orange. 

You can click “By age” or “Mileage” to get the visual comparison data. 

For our case, we used “Total” defects by “Mileage” to get the below bar chart.




So, what makes Lexus the king of reliability mile after mile? It comes down to higher-grade components, more stringent quality control, and fewer standard features to break.

Of course, Toyota still tops all non-luxury brands for longevity. But for that extra dose of bulletproof dependability, Lexus takes the crown. Its ultra-durable build and upscale parts ensure it outlasts its parent company by tens of thousands of miles before repairs are needed.

toyota-camry-vs-honda-accord-vs-mazda-6.title: タイトル：Toyota Camry vs Honda Accord vs Mazda 6：統計に基づく信頼性比較
toyota-camry-vs-honda-accord-vs-mazda-6.text:
タイトル：Toyota Camry vs Honda Accord vs Mazda 6：統計に基づく信頼性比較

イントロダクション：
自動車市場での競争は激化しており、トヨタカムリ、ホンダアコード、マツダ6は中型セダンの分野で人気のあるモデルです。この記事では、統計データに基づいて、これらの車の信頼性を比較します。信頼性は、所有者の満足度、故障率、メンテナンスコストなどの要素によって評価されます。

1. 所有者の満足度：
まず、所有者の満足度を比較します。J.D. PowerやConsumer Reportsなどの信頼性調査結果に基づいて、各車の所有者がどれだけ満足しているかを評価します。これにより、車の品質や信頼性についての一般的な見解を得ることができます。

2. 故障率：
次に、各車の故障率を比較します。信頼性の高い車は、故障が少なく、所有者が安心して乗ることができる車です。信頼性調査や保険会社の統計データを参考に、各車の故障率を評価します。

3. メンテナンスコスト：
車の信頼性を評価する際には、メンテナンスコストも重要な要素です。車のメンテナンスや修理にかかる費用は、所有者にとっての負担となります。統計データやオーナーレビューを参考に、各車のメンテナンスコストを比較します。

4. 保証：
最後に、各車の保証についても比較します。信頼性の高い車は、メーカーが自信を持って保証を提供している場合があります。保証期間や内容を調査し、各車の保証の信頼性を評価します。

結論：
以上の要素を総合的に考慮し、Toyota Camry、Honda Accord、Mazda 6の信頼性を比較しました。統計に基づくデータを参考にすることで、購入者が信頼性の高い車を選ぶ際に役立つ情報を提供しました。ただし、個々の所有者の経験や好みによっても評価は異なるため、最終的な選択は個人の判断に委ねられます。

volkswagen-golf-vs-mazda-3.title: 【統計に基づく信頼性比較】フォルクスワーゲン・ゴルフVSマツダ3 - どちらが優れているのか？
volkswagen-golf-vs-mazda-3.text:
【統計に基づく信頼性比較】フォルクスワーゲン・ゴルフVSマツダ3 - どちらが優れているのか？

自動車の信頼性は、その所有者にとって非常に重要な要素です。それは、車がどれだけ長く、そしてどれだけ問題なく走行できるかを示しています。今回は、統計データに基づいて、フォルクスワーゲン・ゴルフとマツダ3の信頼性を比較します。この記事では、それぞれの車がどれだけ信頼できるのか、またその理由を詳しく解説します。

まず、信頼性の高さを決定する主要な要素は、車の欠陥の数とその重大性です。これらの要素は、車の信頼性を大きく左右します。また、車の信頼性は、その技術的な詳細にも大きく依存します。それぞれの車がどのような技術を採用しているのか、その詳細を深堀りしていきましょう。

フォルクスワーゲン・ゴルフは、その堅牢な構造と高品質な部品で知られています。一方、マツダ3は、その独自のSKYACTIV技術と優れた燃費性能で評価されています。これらの技術は、それぞれの車がどれだけ信頼性が高いのかを示しています。

しかし、これらの情報だけでは十分ではありません。それぞれの車の信頼性を正確に比較するためには、具体的な統計データが必要です。そのため、この記事の最後には、それぞれの車の信頼性を比較するための統計チャートを掲載しています。

自動車の信頼性は、その所有者にとって非常に重要な要素です。それは、車がどれだけ長く、そしてどれだけ問題なく走行できるかを示しています。今回は、統計データに基づいて、フォルクスワーゲン・ゴルフとマツダ3の信頼性を比較します。この記事では、それぞれの車がどれだけ信頼できるのか、またその理由を詳しく解説します。

自動車の信頼性、欠陥、比較、統計といったキーワードを用いて、詳細な分析を行います。車の専門家として、私たちはあなたに最も信頼できる情報を提供します。それでは、一緒に統計チャートを見ていきましょう。
